meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Yakout
meta.description: Find answers to common questions about using Yakout's real estate platform, property searches, bookings, and more.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about using our platform

search.no_results_description: Try adjusting your search or browse by category

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help you.

questions.question: What is Yakout?
questions.answer: Yakout is Morocco's premier real estate platform connecting property seekers with licensed agents. Whether you're looking for a daily vacation rental, a monthly apartment, or buying your dream home, we offer comprehensive listings across major Moroccan cities.

questions.question: Is Yakout free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! Browsing properties, viewing details, and contacting agents is completely free. There are no fees or subscriptions required to search for daily rentals, monthly rentals, or homes for sale.

questions.question: Which cities does Yakout cover?
questions.answer: We cover major Moroccan cities including Marrakech, Casablanca, Rabat, Agadir, Tangier, Fes, and more. Our coverage is constantly expanding across Morocco.

questions.question: What types of properties can I find on Yakout?
questions.answer: Yakout offers three main categories: Daily Rentals (perfect for vacations and short stays), Monthly Rentals (for longer-term housing), and Home Sales (to purchase your property). Each category includes villas, apartments, studios, traditional riads, and more.

questions.question: How do I search for a specific rental type?
questions.answer: Use the main navigation menu to select Daily Rent, Monthly Rent, or Home Sale. Then refine your search using filters for location, property type, price range, number of bedrooms, and amenities.

questions.question: Can I save my favorite properties?
questions.answer: Yes! Click the heart icon on any property to save it to your favorites. Access your saved properties anytime from the favorites menu, whether it's a daily rental, monthly rental, or home for sale.

questions.question: What's the difference between daily and monthly rentals?
questions.answer: Daily rentals are priced per night and ideal for short stays, vacations, or business trips (minimum usually 1-2 nights). Monthly rentals are priced per month and require longer commitments, typically starting from 1 month, perfect for students, professionals, or temporary housing.

questions.question: How do I contact an agent about a property?
questions.answer: Each property listing has a contact form. Fill in your details and specify whether you're interested in daily rental, monthly rental, or purchasing. The agent will receive your inquiry and contact you directly with availability and pricing.

questions.question: How quickly will an agent respond?
questions.answer: Most agents respond within 24 hours during business days. For urgent daily rental bookings, agents often respond faster to accommodate your travel dates.

questions.question: What information should I include in my inquiry?
questions.answer: For daily rentals: specify your check-in/check-out dates and number of guests. For monthly rentals: mention your desired move-in date, rental duration (3 months, 6 months, 1 year), and any specific requirements. For home purchases: indicate your budget and preferred neighborhoods.

questions.question: How do I book a daily rental?
questions.answer: After contacting an agent through the platform, they'll confirm availability for your dates, provide the total cost (nightly rate Ã— number of nights), and guide you through the booking process including payment and check-in details.

questions.question: How do monthly rentals work?
questions.answer: Monthly rentals require direct negotiation with the property owner or agent. You'll discuss lease duration (typically 3-12 months), monthly rent, security deposit (usually 1-2 months' rent), and sign a rental contract before moving in.

questions.question: What's the process for buying a property?
questions.answer: For home purchases, the agent will arrange property viewings, provide legal documentation, guide you through price negotiations, and connect you with notaries to complete the sale. All legal formalities are handled between you and the agent.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: Payment methods vary by agent and rental type. Daily rentals often accept bank transfers or cash. Monthly rentals typically require bank transfers for rent and deposits. Home purchases follow Moroccan real estate law with notarized transactions.

questions.question: Are deposits required?
questions.answer: Daily rentals may require a booking deposit or full prepayment. Monthly rentals typically require a security deposit of 1-2 months' rent. Home purchases require a down payment as per Moroccan property law, discussed with your agent.

questions.question: What are the cancellation policies?
questions.answer: Cancellation policies vary: Daily rentals may have flexible to strict policies depending on the property. Monthly rentals follow lease agreement terms (usually require 1-3 months notice). Home purchase cancellations depend on contract terms and may involve penalties.

questions.question: Are all agents licensed?
questions.answer: Yes, all agents on Yakout must have valid Moroccan real estate licenses. We verify credentials to ensure you work with qualified professionals whether you're renting daily, monthly, or purchasing property.

questions.question: Can an agent help with all property types?
questions.answer: Most agents specialize in specific areas or property types. Some focus on vacation rentals (daily), others on residential leasing (monthly), and some specialize in property sales. Check the agent's profile and listings to see their expertise.

questions.question: How do agent commissions work?
questions.answer: Agent fees vary by service: Daily rentals are often commission-free for renters. Monthly rentals may charge 1 month's rent as commission. Home purchases typically charge 2-3% of the sale price. Always confirm fees with your agent upfront.

questions.question: Do I need an account to browse properties?
questions.answer: No account required! Browse all daily rentals, monthly rentals, and homes for sale freely. Submit inquiries without registering. Our platform is designed for easy, immediate access.

questions.question: Is my personal information safe?
questions.answer: Yes, your data is protected. Contact information is only shared with agents you choose to contact. Review our Privacy Policy for complete details on data handling.

questions.question: What languages does Yakout support?
questions.answer: Yakout is available in English, French, Spanish, and Arabic. Switch languages using the menu to browse daily rentals, monthly rentals, and property sales in your preferred language.

questions.question: Is Yakout mobile-friendly?
questions.answer: Yes! Our website works perfectly on smartphones and tablets. Browse daily rentals, monthly rentals, and homes for sale on any device by visiting yakout.ma.

questions.question: Who can I contact for support?
questions.answer: For technical support or questions about daily rentals, monthly rentals, or home purchases, contact us at legal@yakout.ma or call +212 5XX XXX XXX. We're here to help!
